name: River Jump!
description:
From the creator of the hit game STICK HERO!

This is a lovely cute game.Help our handsome frog!
Just aim at the next platform and tap screen to jump across the river. Collect diamonds during the journey and unlock tons of characters.
Watch out! Don’t fall into the river. Good luck!

How far can you go?
Can you unlock all the characters?
